question: what happened to the actor who played frost on rizzoli and isles
api_result: The actor who played Frost on "Rizzoli & Isles" is Lee Thompson Young. Tragically, he passed away on August 19, 2013, at the age of 29. His death was ruled a suicide, and it brought attention to mental health issues. Young was remembered for his talent and the impact he had on his colleagues and fans. After his passing, the show honored his memory in subsequent episodes.
